episode.title: Proprioceptive Lie
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Rene Ritchie returns to the show for a year-in-review look back at Apple’s 2018: the Mac, iPad, iPhone, Apple Watch, Siri and services, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Rene Ritchie returns to the show for a year-in-review look back at Apple’s 2018: the Mac, iPad, iPhone, Apple Watch, Siri and services, and more.

Sponsored by:

  • OmniFocus: Accomplish more every day with the trusted, gold-standard to-do app for Mac, iPhone, iPad, and now even the web.
  • Casper: Get $50 off select mattresses with code talkshow. Terms and conditions apply.
  • Squarespace: Make your next move. Use code talkshow for 10% off your first order.

Links:

  • The C64 Mini.
  • Raspberry Pi.
  • Vortex Race 3 mechanical keyboard.
  • The other “Vortex”.
  • The MacBook ARM — video from Rene laying out the similarities between Apple’s 2005 transition from PowerPC to Intel and the seemingly inevitable coming transition from Intel to in-house ARM chips.
  • Apple Watch Series 4 detects man’s potentially deadly heart condition.
  • John Giannandrea, Siri, and AI/ML.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
